You noticed that the closest tables to the arena were 200 ft away and that from four angles there was a huge gap that lacked tables. You were about to ask Cindy of why a buffet would have a sumo arena, but it soon became clear as you spotted two sumo wrestlers walk towards the dohyo. You then spot a dragon who happens to be the owner of the buffet step to where the referee would usually stand.

"Ladies and Gentlemen! Boys and Girls! I Ken Sotomoto am glad to present this hour's sumo tourney! As you enjoy your time at our buffet I encourage you to get more helpings as the matches go on. There will be a total of six matches, with each match taking place ten minutes after the previous match. That should give you folks plenty of time to fill your plates and watch top quality entertainment provided by some of Zaftig's greatest sumo celebrities. Our contender is a favorite underdog turned pro. He is 8'5" and weighs a whopping ton. Put your paws together for Terishmo!"

The crowd cheers as the 2000 lb. doberman step into the ring. After stepping into the ring Terishmo flexes showing off some hidden muscle under his flabby form.

"Our next contender is a real big shot and a real top cat. Standing at 8'7" and weighing 2200 lbs. I give you Nekodoran!"

The crowd roars as a large tiger enters the ring. Unlike Terishmo, Nekodoran doesn't seem as over confident. He still gives off a huge presence even though both wrestlers are shorter than you. Then without warning Ken Sotomoto gives the signal for the match to begin. Both wrestlers are evenly matched, but in the end ...
15521.title: Grabbing some grub at the Buffet

choices: Lotussaka loses
Tsunamterro loses
155212.content:
Both wrestlers are evenly matched, but in the end Nekodoran wins. The crowd cheers as the massive tiger flexes. The intensity of the sumo match was so intense that you finished all three plates of food by the time the match was over. You quickly glance back at Cindy who was still on her second plate of food. You then proceed back into the buffet line to grab some more grub.Who knew that watching a sumo match while eating could help stimulate an appetite. Despite seeing the first match you want to see some more sumo action before jumping the gun and deciding to become a sumo wrestler. You figure that with you magical powers, new found strength you figure that life of a sumo wrestler may be interesting.

After filling up a few more plates with food you make your back to the table. You then notice an enclosed area the two sumo wrestlers who just faced each other enjoying some food with some other well-to-do patrons.

"What's up with that area over there?' You ask Cindy.

"That's the VIP area. It costs extra to eat there, but high ranking sumo wrestlers get a discount if they agree to wrestle for Ken Sotomoto. Other than that the food they have is the same. The only other difference are shorter lines." Cindy replies.

You then continue eating. eight minutes later you restock your plates with more food. You notice that your stomach is bloated. You deduced that you must have gained at least five pounds, but it seems that abs haven't diminished in definition. You then find your seat where you see Cindy enjoying her fourth plate of food. You then see two more sumo wrestlers walk towards the arena and Ken Sotomoto getting ready for the next match.

"It is now time for the second match folks. If you thought the guys were huge then you're surely mistaken. The intensity only increases as we present more famous wrestlers into the mix. For the second match our first contender is a real ladies man and actually spends as much time working out as he does eating to impress the ladies with muscle and girth. Weighing in at 2500 lbs and standing at 8'11" I present to you Tsunamterro!"

The crowd cheers as a hulking wolf who is clearly exhibiting the best of worlds flexes for the crowds. You notice that he's even sporting an impressive twelve pack on his stomach, yet you also deduce that his fat rolls are uniquely toned that he was able to maintain them despite how much his body wobbled with both fat and muscle.

"Our next opponent is not one to mess around with. She's a foxy fighter and ironically Tsunamterro's girlfriend. Standing at 8'9" and also weighing 2500 lbs. I give you Lotussaka!"

The crowd cheers as an orange fox woman gracefully curtsies before the crowd. Unlike the male wrestlers you noticed that females must wear a jump suit in addition to a mawashi, but even a tight jumpsuit only proved to be more revealing than if she was only in undergarments. It doesn't take long for the match to begin. Yet the dynamic seems different this time. While Tsunamterro is pure brawn in his fighting style it seems that Lotussaka moves with the grace of a lotus in a pond. In the the end and to your surprise....
155212.title: Nekodoran wins

info.brief_description: The place to be for fat furs and expanded creatures of all kinds.
info.description:
This is a resurrection / tribute to one of my favorite interactive stories of all time done by NackFourTails AKA Michael Setzer. Unfortunately the original has been destroyed. However I plan to remake it bigger and better than ever here. If you like this at all, please add, please help this story grow.

RULES:
#1 - No gore or death. Characters should not be killed if at all possible. If, for example, you plan on having a plot revolving around mafia-esq characters who might be assumed to be killing others, keep such events off screen and not described in more detail than necessary. So short of adding drama to the plot, death should not factor in for the main character if at all possible.

#2 - Keep vore to a minimum. This might be a city of fat furs but I'm assuming most get that way by eating food, not others. I have Vore listed as minimal because there are other more interesting ways of voring individuals that could be used. Either way, for whatever reason, voring does not kill characters here.

#3 - No short posts. Any post added must be a minimum of three paragraphs or approximately two hundred and fifty words. Which is not as hard as some might think. Longer posts will be greatly appreciated though.

#4 – Give everyone an out. All chapters should have two options at the very least. Give everyone a chance to follow the story you want to see and a way to escape that path if they want.

#5 – Keep the flow. Everyone is entitled to interject their own ideas, however do not suddenly stop a story line for no reason to start a new one. So if there's a character given super powers, don't just suddenly strip them from him for some arbitrary reason and dump him somewhere to start your story. See point 4. If everyone is given an 'out' then everyone will get the chance for the story they want.

#6 – Keep the focus towards Weight Gain and Inflation of various kinds. Transformation can play a part too, as well as other changes, but WG and Inflation should be the main subjects of interest of the city for the most part.

#8 – Use of cubs/kits. I'm all for seeing fat child furs in such stories and making them fatter. But while adult situations might happen in this interactive, pre-teen furs are off limits save for expansions of various kinds. There should be NO INSTANCES OF YIFFING WITH CHILD FURS!

#9 – Oviposition or egg-laying. Some furs like being expanded with hundreds of eggs, and I will allow this. However. All eggs laid must be infertile and not be destined to hatch into hundreds of babies. If having children is to be part of the story keep the number to a minimal amount no matter how many eggs are involved.

#10 – Lastly, have fun with this. This is a world to expand upon and grow huge with creative ideas. The rules above are guidelines rather than strict 'do not cross' guardrails. However, take note of each since anything falling into such categories may be removed if it is deemed inappropriate in one form or another. Such actions will not happen without the author being told though and giving them a chance to correct their chapter. Any abuse or rude behavior, including mean spirited posting, will be removed without such notification though, so 'play nice'.
